content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, so glad to see you again. {A思考星光}I hope you don't mind me stargazing here. Maybe... I'll even witness something mysterious tonight?
{A笑眯眯}We meet again, what a surprise. Don't tell me you're... also running away from your thesis deadline? <style=SizeSmall>Sorry, I forgot this is your own planet.</style>
{A小害羞}Why are you staring at me with that eager expression on your face? ...No, the tail is off limits.
A mysterious phenomenon I've observed about friends is that, {A喜欢}when you dream about someone the previous night... you'll appear in their Planet the next day!
Sorry for disturbing. The warm breeze, the mysterious planet, {A沉醉闻}the aroma of black tea, and you...{短暂停} are why the friendly planet is so beautiful~ Yeep!
